title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Marketing of Ornamental Plant Propagating Material and Ornamental Plants) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (marketing ornamental plant propagating material ornamental plants) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Communities
text_raw:
2. The European Communities 

(Marketing of Ornamental Plant 
Propagating Material and Ornamental Plants) Regulations 1994 (S.I. No. 161 of 
1994) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the definition of 
“Directive”, the following – 

“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive 93/49/EEC of 23 June 19932 (as 
amended by Commission Directive 1999/67/EC of 28 June 19993, 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2018/484 of 21 March 20184, 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 20205 
and Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2022/2438 of 12 
December 2022), Council Directive 98/56/EC of 20 July 19986 (as 
amended by Council Directive 2003/61/EC of 18 June 20037 and 
Regulation (EU) No 652/2014 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 15 May 20148), Commission Directive 1999/66/EC of 28 June 
19999 and Commission Directive 1999/68/EC of 28 June 199910;”. 

1 O.J. No. L 319 of 13.12.2022, p.54 
2 O.J. No. L 250 of 07.10.1993, p.9 
3 O.J. No. L164 of 30.06.1999, p.78 
4 O.J. No. L81 of 23.03.2018, p.10 
5 O.J. No. L41 of 13.02.2020, p.1 
6 O.J. No. L226 of 13.08.1998, p.16 
7 O.J. No. L165 of 03.07.2003, p.23 
8 O.J. No. L189 of 27.06.2014, p.1 
9 O.J. No. L164 of 30.06.1999, p.76 
10 O.J. No. L172 of 08.07.1999, p.42 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Communities 

(Marketing of Ornamental Plant 
Propagating Material and Ornamental Plants) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 208 of 2020) are revoked. 

[282] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 June, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [282]

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
Interpretation) 

These Regulations update existing Legislation with regard to the minimum 
quality standards and controls on the marketing within the European Union of 
ornamental plants and propagating material 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [282] 5
